display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
display_target_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.
